response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to us at $1,000,000. Considering its significance and the potential it holds for you, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price. Kindly let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
